Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
21.08.2013 SH SCR18357 Added test not (DCLN_HADR_COUNTRY = NL and CLNT203_OFFICE = NL) to perform BDH406
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.11.2011 JH SCR16832 Added DEBH_AUTREFLIMBLOCKED
07.04.2011 SH SCR16335 Added BDH406 CapitalSmall conversion
27.01.2011 GB SCR16171 Changed initial value for DEBH_DCIS0BOOKINGNOTALLOWED,
11.01.2010 GBSCR15240 Added an extra DHIC row (Check for existing DHIC)
10.09.2009 AS SCR#14811 aqdded new parameter pi.surpressBDH005
29.09.2008 GB SCR13991 Added condition DEBH_DELETIONBLOCKED= N
01.11.2007 GB SCR13068 added DEBH_CARRIERDOCTRANS = N and
DEBH_REVERSEFACTORING = N
13.02.2006 SH SCR10324 Step9 Extended test to add DHIC according to
INFS_ONEINFOCODEALLPERDEBT = Y
//06.12.2005 EE SCR#9626 new field ESWCHECK
05.11.2005 SH SCR9418 Added new field DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT, init with null
07.09.2005 SH SCR9012 Changed update of DEBH_AUTOCREDITDECISION from 'Y' to
GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID = 127) and DEBH_NEGATIVETEXTCODE back to N
06.09.2005 SH SCR9012 Changed update of DEBH_NEGATIVETEXTCODE form 'N' to
GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID = 127)
on 3.8.2005 WJ SCR8741 DEBH_AUTOCREDITDECISION false --> true
08.04.2005 SH SCR6107 Added call to BDH014 to get DEBH_LANGUAGE if
DCLN_LANGUAGE and CTRY_DEFLANGUAGE both blank.
24.01.2005 SH SCR7707 Extended test for existing DHIC according to
INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE = Y/N
//02-12-2004 JP SCR #7330 replace call to BDH001 by new program
30.08.2004 SH SCR6909 Added new field DEBH_DCIS0BOOKINGNOTALL init with
GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID=49)
22.03.2004 SH SCR5757 Fixed bug where DHIC row has to be stored
27.01.2004 SH SCR5381 Fxed bug where a new DEBH_NO has to be calculated
28.11.2003 SH SCR4897 Extended update of DEBH_LANGUAGE with CTRY_DEFLANGUAGE
- if DCLN_LANGUAGE = empty
03.02.2003 SH SCR2793 Check if there is a DebtorHeller with the new calculated
- v.DEBH_NO (by GB003) in table DEBH, if there is one row calculate a new number
10.12.2002 SH SCR2515 Store one DHIC row if DCLN_DHIC_ID<>blank
28.05.2002 SH SCR1345 Call BDH005 with numeric values, before we converted them
- to alphanumeric
04.04.2002 SH Add call to BDH005 need to store new serachwords for
- the new debtor heller
-- New DEBH_NO, will be calculated by task "Get new DEBH_NO"
-- Call BDH005 (Extract searchwords and storing in table
-- DEBTOR_HELLER_SEARCHWORDS) for the new debtor heller
-- Update name/address/city fields
... HADR city and zipcode
... PADR city and zipcode
-- Update DEBH_LANGUAGE
... if there exists no DLCN_LANGUAGE and CTRY_DEFLANGUAGE get
debtor heller language with BDH014
-- If INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE = 'Y'
-- If INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE = 'N'
-- If INFS_ONEINFOCODEALLPERDEBT = 'Y'
-- If no DHIC exists (accoring to INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE and
INFS_ONEINFOCODEALLPERDEBT = Y) add one to database
-- If there already exist a DebotrHeller with the new calculated DEBH_NO by
-- GB003 we have to call GB003 again to calculate a new number.
-- This task stops immediately if a new number was calculated and there is no
-- DebotrHeller with this number in our database.
